title: 117. The Codependency Chronicles: Blood Isn’t Thicker Than Peace
itunes:title: The Codependency Chronicles: Blood Isn’t Thicker Than Peace
description:
In this episode of The Self Love Fix Podcast, I’m kicking off part two of the series with how blood is not thicker than peace.

Here are a few points I cover: 

  • How to move away from the shame of being a bad child.
  • How family doesn’t have to be family of origin

There’s this huge wound of codependency that makes us second guess ourselves. Unfortunately, the reality is not all of us had that amazing childhood. And I want to let you know that you’re not alone and you deserve to love and be loved.

If you liked this episode of the podcast, take a screenshot, head on over to my Instagram and share it on your IG stories and tag me, @theselflovefix

If you love what you learned, be sure to hit that follow button so you never miss a future episode, and make sure to leave a review to help me reach more listeners just like you looking to follow their inner truth and live a life of abundance & authentic self-love.

Sign up for my free 4 day live challenge from Sep 13-16 here!
